# 使用

 <emui-select v-model="myValue" placeholder="请选择">
    <emui-option
        v-for="item in options"
        :label="item.label"
        :value="item.key"
        :key="item.key"
    ></emui-option>
</emui-select>
<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
        myValue:"",
       options: [
        { key: "key1", label: "选项1" },
        { key: "key2", label: "选项2" },
        { key: "key3", label: "选项3" },
        { key: "key4", label: "选项4" },
        { key: "key5", label: "选项5" },
        { key: "key6", label: "选项6" },
        { key: "key7", label: "选项7" },
      ],
    }
  }
}
</script>

# Attributes

# 1、select

属性 属性值 说明
value/v-model String/Number select所绑定的数据
placeholder String select中的提示文字

# 2、option

属性 属性值 说明
label String/Number option所绑定的数据
value String/Number option所绑定的键

← checkbox table →
